tool_description: This API provides an accurate postal detection within a text
name: Postal Address detection US
title: Postal Address detection US

api_list.name: Extract addresses from text
api_list.description: For a given text, extract each addresses along the text position
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://postal-address-detection-us.p.rapidapi.com/address_detection"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "postal-address-detection-us.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://postal-address-detection-us.p.rapidapi.com/address_detection"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "postal-address-detection-us.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
